resources.string: An error occurred while loading the data
The contact could not be deleted
The contact could not be saved
The existing contact could not be resolved
The contact could not be loaded
One or more contact-groups could not be added.
Sorry, this feature has not yet been implemented for "normal" Android contacts.
Sorry, this feature has not yet been implemented for secret contacts.
Sorry, this feature is not yet implemented.
Secret contacts are only stored within this app and not shared with anyone.
Public contacts are stored in Android\'s standard contact-database and are shared with other apps on the phone.

Are you sure you want to open a chat in WhatsApp with this number?

This action will share the phone-number in question with WhatsApp.

No other contact-information will be shared.
Something went very wrong. The desired operation could not be executed properly.

Something went wrong:

%1$s 

Therefore, the data could not be saved.
Either the first name or the last name needs to be set.
The existing contact could not be resolved. Therefore it could not be changed. Would you like to create it as a new contact instead?
Are you sure you would like to discard all unsaved changes?
Deleted contacts cannot be restored. Are you sure you would like to delete this contact?
Something went wrong. The contact could not be deleted.
Deleted contacts cannot be restored. Are you sure you would like to delete these %1$s contacts?
Something went wrong. %1$s of %2$s attempted contacts could not be deleted.
Something went wrong. No contacts could be deleted.

Changing a contact to \'Secret\' means that it is copied to this app and afterwards deleted from the public contact-database of Android.\n\nPlease make sure that no expected information is missing when checking the contact-details in this app before taking this step.
Changing a contact to \'Public\' means that it is copied to the public contact-database of Android and afterwards deleted from this app.
Something went wrong. %1$s of %2$s attempted contacts could not be changed.
Something went wrong. No contacts could be changed.
The new contact could not be created. Therefore, the old contact of type was not deleted to avoid the loss of your data.
The old contact could not be deleted. However, the new contact has been created. You can now delete the old one manually.
While changing the type of the contact, an error occurred and the contact could not be changed. Therefore, the old contact was left unchanged to avoid data-loss.

While changing the types of %1$s contacts, the change failed for %2$s contacts.
This was due to %3$s failed validation(s) and %4$s other error(s).

In the case of an error the old contact was not deleted to avoid data-loss.
No appropriate app found for this action.
WhatsApp seems not to be installed.
Please change the phone-number to international format, starting with the appropriate country-code, e.g. +1 for the United States.
The navigation to WhatsApp failed for unknown reasons. Please try again.
To show caller information during an incoming call, some permissions are needed.\n\nThese permissions will be used exclusively to match incoming phone-numbers with stored contacts.
Would you like to activate this feature now?

You may have noticed in the play-store that the app accesses your device's "Advertisement ID". We realise that this is undesirable - especially in an app focused on privacy.

Unfortunately, that ID is required for the "Crashlytics" framework to receive error-reports. Without them, we cannot fix bugs in the app. This ID is not used by the app in any other way: no advertisement, no tracking.

In any case, we recommend deleting your device's advertisement ID in the system settings to generally improve your own privacy.
To also manage the contacts from the "normal" Android contacts app, some permissions are needed.\n\nIf wish to use this app only to manage your secret contacts, these permissions are not needed.
%1$s or %2$s is calling you. The number %3$s matches all of those contacts.
Notifications to inform the user about matches between incoming calls and his stored contacts.
The idea of this app is to store contacts which should not be shared with other apps on the device.
We are always happy about feedback about how to improve the app further.
The software is provided as-is. The developers refuse any liability or accountability for any damages or losses occurring due to its use.

The developers have no association whatsoever with WhatsApp or its parent-company. The functionality to open WhatsApp from within this app is based exclusively on public APIs offered by WhatsApp.

No data is shared with WhatsApp unless you click one of the buttons to open a phone-number in WhatsApp.
If you do, the only information shared with WhatsApp is that exact number. Even then, no other information of that contact (e.g. name, email, notes, other phone-numbers, etc.) is shared.

Welcome to "Private Contacts".

The goal of this app is to allow you to store contacts which you do not want to share with the other apps on your device.

It lets you declare for each contact separately whether it should be shared with other apps or not.

Unfortunately, call detection is not available for Android version 9. Long story short, Google made a mess with the necessary permissions. As a result, the feature works for all versions of Android except 9. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Unfortunately, call detection is strongly dependent on phone manufacturers and Android versions.

Therefore, this feature does currently not obtain the same reliability as the rest of this app. Please let us know about any strange or incorrect behavior (see the "About" screen).

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

If you have ever actively denied this permission in the Android permission-dialog, some versions of Android never ask you again but automatically deny subsequent requests for it.

In that case, you unfortunately need to go to system-settings, open the category "apps", select this app and explicitly grant us this permission there.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
Show contact type in contact list
Show additional save button in the edit-screen
Show the navigation-bar at the bottom of the screen
Show buttons in the contact-detail screen to start a chat in WhatsApp.
Public contacts are shared with other apps on the phone. Secret contacts are not.
Public contacts can either be stored locally on the device or e.g. in your Google account.
Incoming calls will be matched with stored contacts to show a notification with the.
Show contact-information about the caller also on the lock-screen.
Show contacts from the normal Android contacts app as well.
Without error reports, we cannot find out if the app crashes. Therefore, we cannot fix these bugs.
Contacts can be exported in VCF format.
Require the user to authenticate before being able to use the app.
If this option is selected, the user must use Android\'s screen-unlock to authenticate.\n\nThis option is only available if a screen-lock is set in the system settings.
Are you sure you want to restore all settings to their default values?
Are you sure you want to delete all secret contacts? Contacts shared with other apps will not be affected but all secret ones will be deleted.

Failed to reset the database. Please try again or notify the developers about this bug. If this does not work, you can also go to the system-settings and delete all data of this app. This will delete the database for sure.\n\nWe apologize for the inconvenience.
This action requires the permission to access Android contacts.
Replace an existing contact if it matches one from the import (same name and ID).
Failed to read VCF in file
Contacts which could not be imported
Failed to open file explorer: cannot select file.\nYour phone does not seem to support this action. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Failed to write contacts to VCF
Contacts which could not be exported
is compatible with all contact apps but does not support all fields. Some data will be lost in the export.
supports all fields: no data will be lost in the export. However, not all contact apps are able to read it.
The contact has been successfully exported.
The contacts have been successfully exported.
Something went wrong. The contact could not be exported.
Something went wrong. %1$s of %2$s attempted contacts could not be exported.
Something went wrong. No contacts could be exported.
Authentication is needed to access this app.
Authentication is needed to change these settings.
Failed to authenticate user: access denied.
No authentication-mechanism is enabled on this device.\n\nPlease enable biometric authentication or a PIN or password in the system-settings to use this feature.
Failed to enable device authentication: please try again or send us a message.
